content:
@WG-ffi-unwind I have a $DAYJOB meeting during our usual check-in time, so I suggest do our biweekly check-in async this week.

Unfortunately I still haven't started writing that longjmp blogpost, so I don't really have anything to report.

I've made some progress on the implementation front. Still not quite review ready, but I think I'll have something that folks can take a look at later on today. Solidarity, fellow $DAYJOB havers :blush: :bread:

A day later than planned, but here's that darn PR! https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/76570

I am bumping into some platform-specific CI errors that I'll sort out, hopefully on Monday? In any case, that's the shape of the implementation of RFC 2945 :tada: I'll mark it as a formal PR, rather than a draft, once I've appeased CI :blush:
@katelyn martin very cool, I'll take a look
